scripts.demo:happy: ts-node -e "(async () => { const { createAdapter } = require('./scripts/cli/adapter'); const { runHappyPath } = require('./scripts/cli/flows/happyPath'); const now = new Date('2026-01-10T10:00:00.000Z'); const adapter = createAdapter(); const res = await runHappyPath(adapter, now); console.log(JSON.stringify(res, null, 2)); })().catch(e=>{console.error(e);process.exit(1);});"
